sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"同事，伙伴"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: associate, companion, comrade, colleague, fellow, partner
means: associate ：普通用词，侧重指在利害关系上密切相关。
companion ：指陪伴他人的人，即同伴或陪伴。
comrade ：指具有共同的事业、利益关系相一致的人。
colleague ：一般用于对同事的正式称呼，基本上专用在职业关系上。
fellow ：多用复数形式，指一块住、生活或同行共事的人。
partner ：指事业中处于合伙关系的人，或指婚姻、游戏、跳舞中的另一方。

word_mean: 专供人员出入，上面设有围罩的甲板开口。

sentence.Network_en: He has been her constant companion for the last four months.
sentence.Network_cn: 4个月来，他一直陪伴在她身边。

sentence.Network_en: He was not a fit companion for their skipper that particular morning.
sentence.Network_cn: 那天早晨，他没能和队长配合好。

sentence.Network_en: You come over as a capable and amusing companion.
sentence.Network_cn: 你给人的感觉是一个能干、风趣的同伴。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 同字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 同班同学〖 classmate〗 同伴〖 companion〗 同胞〖 bornofthesameparents〗.
字典中伴字的解释 ... (4) 相比[ compare] (1) 伴侣;同伴[ companion] ◎ 伴 bàn.
字典中偶字的解释 ... (2) 同本义[ image;idol] (4) 伙伴;同伴;与人共处[ companion] (1) 配合[ coordinate;concert].
人教版高中英语单词表(第三册上必修) - 豆丁网 ... telegram n. 电报 companion n. 同伴；同事 blame vt. 责备；责怪.

list.abs: 三星给 Galaxy S IV 打上了“生活伴侣”（life companion）的标签，认为这是一款可以给你的人生带来帮助的手机，这和去年“以人为本” …
这种关系称为“友谊之爱（companionate love）”，这就是密友之间的关系，我们承诺彼此坦诚，承诺永远做朋友，但是这里不含肉体 …
爱是生死相许（longtime companion）：同志面对爱滋的感人友谊，1989 墨利斯的情人（maurice）：中产阶级男孩对爱情的觉醒爱 …
...为避免用药错误，浪费资源，美国FDA近年积极推动「伴随式诊断 （Companion Diagnostics）」，这也让体外诊断试剂 （IVD）市 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French compaignon, literally 'one who breaks bread with another', based on Latin com- 'together with' + panis 'bread'
mid 18th cent.: from obsolete Dutch kompanje (earlier form of kampanje) 'quarterdeck', from Old French compagne, from Italian (camera della) compagna ('storeroom for) provisions'

entry.def: A companion is someone who you spend time with or who you are travelling with.

example.ex: Fred had been her constant companion for the last six years of her life...
example.tran: 在她生命的最后6年，弗莱德一直是她忠实的伴侣。

example.ex: I asked my travelling companion what he thought of the situation in Algeria.
example.tran: 我问我的驴友对阿尔及利亚的形势有什么看法。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is frequently in the company of another;
3. one paid to accompany or assist or live with another

auth_sentence.content: Prof Higgs has been made a Companion of Honour.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ac加强+company陪伴+ment具体物→n.陪伴物, 伴奏
com共同+pan谋生;食物+ion人→共同谋生的人
com共同+pan谋生;食物+y人等→共同谋生者→公司, 陪伴

Sentence.sentence: Energy independence" and its rhetorical (修辞的) companion "energy security" are, however, slippery concepts that are rarely though through.
The ideal companion machine would not only look, feel, and sound friendly but would also be programmed to behave in an agreeable manner.
The ideal companion machine would not only look, feel, and sound friendly but would also be programmed to behave in an agreeable manner.

sentences.en: The companion volume will soon be published.
sentences.cn: 这卷书的姊妹篇即将问世。

jushi.english: A dictionary is his constant companion.
She looked around for her probable companions.
jushi.chinese: 她环顾四周寻找可能的同伴。
